Text.Name: Hungry1
Text.Desc: Please, let me eat something, anything!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Starving with no food around leaves one with nothing to do but groan

Text.Name: Hungry2
Text.Desc: I'm soooooo hungry. Isn't there anything to eat?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The hunger is so bad that the only thing that can be is to rub one's stomach

Text.Name: Hungry3
Text.Desc: I'm famished, perhaps I should find something to eat?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that feeling hard to stay focused when one's so hungry

Text.Name: Hungry4
Text.Desc: I ate so much it's uncomfortable.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Eating too much can also leave one in pain

Text.Name: Thirsty1
Text.Desc: I'm so thirsty, I don't know what to do.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that feeling no fun when your lips are cracking because your mouth is parched like a desert

Text.Name: Thirsty2
Text.Desc: Please, water...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that When one is this thirsty, they become hoarse from it

Text.Name: Thirsty3
Text.Desc: My throat is parched, I could use some water.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that feeling getting a bit difficult to swallow

Text.Name: Fatigue1
Text.Desc: I feel like I'll pass out at any moment.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Exhaustion has led to drowsiness and that could lead to passing out

Text.Name: Fatigue2
Text.Desc: If I don't get some rest, I'm liable to pass out.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Rubbing one's eyes is all that can be done to stay awake

Text.Name: Fatigue3
Text.Desc: Some sleep would hit the spot.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Some sleep would really help stop all this yawning

Text.Name: Entertainment1
Text.Desc: This day is lasting forever.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Boredom has led to agitation..

Text.Name: Entertainment2
Text.Desc: There's got to be something more interesting to do.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that All that can be done to relieve the boredom is to swing one's arms around

Text.Name: Entertainment3
Text.Desc: I should be able to find something more interesting to do.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that This boredom gets on one's nerves

Text.Name: Entertainment4
Text.Desc: It may be a bit boring, but at least life is peaceful.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that There are worse things than boredom

Text.Name: Entertainment5
Text.Desc: Life seems so interesting and full of happiness.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that An interesting life is invigorating

Text.Name: Entertainment6
Text.Desc: A colorful life, really leaves a lot to look forward to each day.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such variety in life leaves one euphoric

Text.Name: JoinSchool
Text.Desc: I've been taken in, I'm going to become an Immortal!!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Having just been taken in, it's not difficult to feel elated

Text.Name: NoTool
Text.Desc: I guess [TXT] is possible using one's hands? This hurts.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Not having the appropriate tools causes one to really grumble

Text.Name: BeKick
Text.Desc: What did I do wrong?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Anger becomes explosive when one gets expelled

Text.Name: Iamdying
Text.Desc: I'm going to die.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that An exhausted lifespan is certainly something to fret over

Text.Name: WalkerBeHelp
Text.Desc: There really are a lot of good people in this world.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Receiving assistance leaves one feeling grateful

Text.Name: WalkerBeKick
Text.Desc: These people are unbelievable.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Getting expelled fills one with rage

Text.Name: BeSale
Text.Desc: What did I do wrong?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Feeling upset about being gifted to others
